entities.name: goblet
entities.description: The goblet is mentioned as an object that turns red and shoots out a piece of parchment.

entities.name: parchment
entities.description: A second piece of parchment is shot out of the goblet by the flames.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore announces Fleur Delacour as the champion for Beauxbatons.

entities.name: fleur delacour
entities.description: Fleur Delacour is announced as the champion for Beauxbatons by Dumbledore.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron confirms that Fleur Delacour is indeed the champion for Beauxbatons.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry shouts in confirmation of Fleur Delacour being the champion for Beauxbatons.

entities.name: beauxbatons
entities.description: Beauxbatons is mentioned as a school that has a party and a champion.

entities.name: ravenclaw
entities.description: Ravenclaw is mentioned as one of the houses in the school.

entities.name: hufflepuff
entities.description: Hufflepuff is mentioned as another house in the school.

relationships.description: Dumbledore announces Fleur Delacour as the champion for Beauxbatons.
Ron confirms that Fleur Delacour is indeed the champion for Beauxbatons.
Harry shouts in confirmation of Fleur Delacour being the champion for Beauxbatons.
Beauxbatons is hosting a party, and Ravenclaw is one of the houses present.
Beauxbatons is hosting a party, and Hufflepuff is another house present.
